headline: DaVita Kidney Care Profit Milestone Highlights Emerging Value Based Earnings Mix
summary: DaVita (NYSE:DVA) reports its Integrated Kidney Care segment has reached profitability for the first time. The milestone follows a shift toward value-based contracts, digital tools and home-based kidney care services. The company links the progress to its integrated care model and clearer regulatory frameworks around kidney care delivery. For investors, the key angle is that DaVita is more than a center-based dialysis operator. The Integrated Kidney Care unit is built around coordinated...
